column5: To all of my American family and friends. Thanksgiving is the sanest holiday we have. I hope that you all have the nicest day sharing a meal and good times.
Thanks Roy The bird has been in the oven since 5am and it smells incredible

It is a day of family and friends with a good dash of food added in. It also is a day to give thanks for all of the people who have entered our lives and enriched them. I am very happy to say I have thousands of friends that I am thankful for. Some I will never meet in person but will have been enriched by their knowledge and kindness over the internet.  Thank you to all who read this and best wishes to all.   Art
Have a wonderful day with family and friends y'all...I won't be able to get roast turkey and stuffing outta my head...

One of my favorite holidays. Gonna eat like its my last meal. It's gonna be repulsive!  But....  I'm going to thank God for his blessings. For the family that I have and for the continued prosperity for which he has graced me.  All the best!
Thanks Roy.  Thanksgiving has always been an important day for our family.

I heard today,Thanksgiving is a much better/bigger celebration than Christmas?.A radio station I listen to were talking to a few Americans and all I heard was this is the big day.Family and friends were most important.Couldn't agree more!!!!.Have a good one guys!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Thanks Roy.   Just gettin back from Pittsburgh with Patsy's daughter and family
